value:
$WmMPID_比翼リン,ch03_00_Lin_FF_Pair,Face|I still have no idea how he manages
to stay as focused as he does.$k$pBut surely we'll know after this
next battle. Right, Florina?$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|R-right! I'll just have to stay calm!
Just...stay calm...$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|In the name of Hoshido, I will
see us victorious!$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|Watch now, Sister. I will not
lose this time.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ツイハーク,ch09_22_Twihark_M_Ninja20,Face|Win or lose, I won't complain.
We're here to enjoy the festival!$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ナバール,ch01_02_Nabarl_M_Ninja20,Face|Enough talk. Start the fight.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_比翼リン,ch03_00_Lin_FF_Pair,Face|Ah, we lost in the end.
That's a shame.$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|I'm sorry, Lady Lyndis... I-if I weren't
so weak, it wo—$k$p$nMPID_比翼リン|That's not true, Florina.
Our loss is my fault.$k$pI wanted to help you calm your mind,
but I couldn't even do it myself...$k$pWith you here, I wanted to win...
Maybe I wanted it too much, because
I panicked as a result.$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|Lady Lyndis, I—$k$p$nMPID_比翼リン|I am the one who should be sorry,
Florina. And I will be when next
I have to face Navarre...$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|Don't be sorry, Lady Lyndis! We may
have lost, but I'm still happy... Happy
you care so much.$k$pAnd besides, I think I learned
something about keeping my
mind in the present moment.$k$p$nMPID_比翼リン|Really? You did?$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|I learned that even you can panic
sometimes—and if that's true, even
I can keep calm sometimes too!$k$pAnd when I realized that, I stopped
feeling so anxious.$k$p$nMPID_比翼リン|Ah... Well, good.$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|I thought about how you must feel
whenever you support me through
a moment of panic...$k$pAnd when I thought like that,
I knew that I had to do better.$k$pI'm going to try harder! So, don't
abandon me... Let's keep supporting
each other as friends, all right?$k$p$nMPID_比翼リン|What are you talking about! Of course
we'll continue to be friends! But that
said...I am a little sad.$k$pIf you find a way of maintaining
focus on your own, I will have
fewer chances to support you...$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|What? Well, I'm still a long way off
from that. I don't even know if I'll
EVER make it as far as that... *sigh*$k$pWhat ever will I do?$k$p$nMPID_比翼リン|Hee hee...$k$p$Sbs150|
